name: STAY AWAY! (u3217318)
description:
You’re walking home from school until suddenly you find yourself transported to a dark forest?! With a big brain for puzzle solving and a dwindling tiny lamp, you must find your way out of this dark maze but be careful; monsters are waiting in the shadows for a tasty late-night snack.

A prototype made for 2022 Experimental Game Design Jam 1 - "Keep Your Distance".
